children.name: tagline
children.description: A short tagline that appears above the main heading in the hero banner section.

children.name: heading
children.description: The main heading for the page that describes the product free trial offering.

children.name: list_item_one
children.description: First key benefit or feature of the product.

children.name: list_item_two
children.description: Second key benefit or feature of the product.

children.name: list_item_three
children.description: Third key benefit or feature of the product.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.

children.name: image
children.description: An image showing the product.

children.name: image
children.description: An image showcasing the solutions or features of the product.

children.name: heading
children.description: Heading for the solutions or features section.

children.name: item_one
children.description: First solution or feature description.

children.name: item_two
children.description: Second solution or feature description.

children.name: item_three
children.description: Third solution or feature description.

children.name: item_four
children.description: Fourth solution or feature description.

children.name: item_five
children.description: Fifth solution or feature description.

children.name: quote
children.description: A customer testimonial quote about their experience with the product.

children.name: author_name
children.description: The name of the customer providing the testimonial.

children.name: author_title
children.description: The job title or company of the customer providing the testimonial.

children.name: author_image
children.description: A headshot of the customer providing the testimonial.

children.name: link_text
children.description: Text for the link to view more information about the testimonial (e.g. Read case study).

children.name: heading
children.description: Heading for the gallery section showing product screenshots or features.

children.name: description
children.description: A description of what's being showcased in the gallery images.

children.name: image_one
children.description: First gallery image showing a product screenshot or feature.

children.name: image_two
children.description: Second gallery image showing a product screenshot or feature.

children.name: image_three
children.description: Third gallery image showing a product screenshot or feature.

children.name: heading
children.description: Heading for the metrics section highlighting key performance indicators or statistics.

children.name: number
children.description: First metric number or statistic.

children.name: label
children.description: Label explaining what the first metric represents.

children.name: number
children.description: Second metric number or statistic.

children.name: label
children.description: Label explaining what the second metric represents.

children.name: number
children.description: Third metric number or statistic.

children.name: label
children.description: Label explaining what the third metric represents.

children.name: question
children.description: First frequently asked question about the product or free trial.

children.name: answer
children.description: Answer to the first frequently asked question.

children.name: heading
children.description: Heading for the call-to-action section at the bottom of the page.

children.name: button_one_text
children.description: Text for the primary call-to-action button.

children.name: button_one_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the primary call-to-action button.
